game.name: Sea Power : Naval Combat in the Missile Age
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: From the lead designer of Cold Waters, Sea Power lets you control NATO and Warsaw Pact forces in modern naval conflict campaigns. Use your advanced naval weaponry and sensors to respect rules of engagement and defeat the enemy forces in a tense fight for initiative and air/naval supremacy.
game.shortDescriptionEn: From the lead designer of Cold Waters, Sea Power lets you control NATO and Warsaw Pact forces in modern naval conflict campaigns. Use your advanced naval weaponry and sensors to respect rules of engagement and defeat the enemy forces in a tense fight for initiative and air/naval supremacy.

reviewHighlights.text: 앵카 박고 싶을 정도로 엄청난 해군 뽕
